channel.title: Npc help!
channel.description: i added barrows to my server and i wanted to see if they dropped the right stuff how do i change their hp cuz they at infinite and they won't die. can you help me?

item.title: Npc help!

item.description:

dude i dont leech i have never leeched in my life i just wanted help everyone is so mean! is it because im a member and not a senior member

item.title: Npc help!
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“The Almost, post:1, topic:80114”]i added barrows to my server and i wanted to see if they dropped the right stuff
how do i change their hp cuz they at infinite and they won’t die.
can you help me?[/quote]
i can recaall you making infinite health to players, lol whats wrong cant leech a tutorial for npcs?

[quote=“Zzz O zzZ, post:2, topic:80114”]Go Into npc.class file. It shows the npc’s such as:

//----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat–health

npc = 121 Dwarf 9 0 (This is the health of it)
npc = 122 Hobgoblin 28 0
npc = 123 Hobgoblin 42 0
npc = 124 Earth_warrior 51 0
npc = 125 Ice_warrior 57 0
npc = 126 Otherworldly_being

The last number is the health.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Npc help!
item.dc:creator: @Zzz_O_zzZ Zzz O zzZ
item.description:
@Zzz_O_zzZ wrote:

Go Into npc.class file. It shows the npc’s such as:

//----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat–health

npc = 121 Dwarf 9 0 (This is the health of it)
npc = 122 Hobgoblin 28 0
npc = 123 Hobgoblin 42 0
npc = 124 Earth_warrior 51 0
npc = 125 Ice_warrior 57 0
npc = 126 Otherworldly_being

The last number is the health.
